name: Minute Gear Seconds
description:
Play as REX, the newest member of the sneaking unit GRIZZ, as she traverse through 4 training missions. The catch? She only has 1 minute to complete them all. 

Getting Caught by an enemy's line of sight won't result in a game over, but it will decrease your time quickly. If the timer reaches 0, its game over.

Controls

WASD - Move Around

Space Bar- Dash (in the direction you are facing)

Refresh the page to restart the game.

For the Gamemaker's Toolkit 2019 Game Jam. The theme was Only One, so I made a 1 Screen, 1 Minute, 1 Life, 2D Metal Gear Clone.

As my first game jam, I'm surprised how this went. Even without pulling an all nighter, I still got some time left by the time I submitted this. Another thing I'm really happy about is that this project incorporates elements of a stealth game I made in my first game dev class. In that class, it took me a month to do everything such as code the movement and enemy Ai. Now, it took me 2 days to do what I have now PLUS more. If that's not a sign of progress, I don't know what is! 

Coding and Art done by me. Music is Interstellar Legacy from https://patrickdearteaga.com/arcade-music/
